description: A group model of joist to design
title: JoistGroupingModel

JoistDescription.description: The designation name of the Josit

Depth_in.description: Depth of the joist in inches

Capacity_plf.description: Capacity of the Joist in PLF (ASD)

BridgingRequirements.description: Provides the specifications for joist bridging.

topChordRows.description: Required number of top chord rows.

bottomChordRows.description: Required number of bottom chord rows.

exRows.description: Required number of diagonal erection rows.

ErrorMessages.description: Any Errors from the attempted design of the joist

Warning.description: Warning flag to help with logic handling

JoistDesignLoads.description: the design loads used for gravity and uplift, put through load combos

Group_ID.description: This is the GUID of the joist design group

QtyOfType.description: The Number of Joists contained within this design group

MaxDepth_in.description: Setting to limit the max depth this joist group can be

MinDepth_in.description: Setting to limit the min depth this joist group can be

LiveLoadReductionFactor.description: How much this joist group can have it's Live Load reduced

EndReactions.description: The end reactions of the joist in kips for each load type (service level)

JoistLinearLoads_plf.description: These are the unfactored linear loads applied to the joist (plf)
